  • CloudFlare API v4!
    • List all data associated with your account
    • List all domains and their ID’s
    • Return list of all dns records associated with domain
    • Get user info or your current details
    • Update user
    • Get user billing profile
    • Firewall rules
    • ZONE related
    • DNS Records
    • Analytics
    • Zone firewall rules
  • SolusVM API v1
  • Virtualizor Enduser API
    • Get list of VPS’s
    • START, STOP, RESTART, POWEROFF the VPS
    • GET or SET server’s hostname
    • Get CPU details
    • Get Bandwidth Details
    • List the processes - OpenVZ only
    • List the services - OpenVZ only
    • Change ROOT password of the VPS
    • Get the VNC Details XEN/KVM only
    • Change VNC password XEN/KVM only
    • List available OS Templates
    • Reinstall the OS

InstallationÂ¶

At the command line:

pip install lowendspirit

Or, if you have virtualenvwrapper installed:

mkvirtualenv lowendspirit
pip install lowendspirit
